meanings.definition: An organism that thrives in extreme environmental conditions.
meanings.sent1: The extremophile in the deep sea can survive in very cold water.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study extremophiles to understand how life can adapt to harsh environments.
meanings.sent3: The extremophile at the top of the mountain must really enjoy the chilly weather.
meanings.sent4: She's like an extremophile, thriving in the toughest situations.
meanings.sent5: The extremophile's ability to survive in extreme conditions is truly remarkable.

meanings.sent3: The extremophile in the desert must love the heatwave!
meanings.sent4: Like an extremophile, he remains cool under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The extremophile's heat resistance is astonishing.
